attributes.action: Have the VAR microphone played on TV for decisions in the Premier League
attributes.background: The conversation between the VAR officials and the referees should be played out loud on TV like in every other sport. This will give everyone watching an understanding of why the decision is made.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the FA.

In any case you'll need to give your full name to start a petition
